content: Yes, Gaula River is a great destination for salmon fishing! The best time of year to catch salmon in Gaula River is from mid-June to the end of August. This is when the river is at its warmest and the fish are more active. The peak season for salmon fishing is in late July and early August when the fish are spawning. However, it's important to note that fishing regulations and quotas may vary depending on the time of year and the area of the river. Make sure to check local fishing regulations and obtain the necessary permits before heading out to fish. Additionally, hiring a local guide or joining a guided tour can be helpful in ensuring a successful and enjoyable fishing trip.
